name: Pico's target practice
description:
credit to ninjamuffin99 and TomFulp

Pico was having a rap battle with Keith (not his real name but idc)

After the battle, Pico wanted to try out his gun because it was brand new and he's never tried it before, so they did some target practice.

move your mouse = aim   

click - shoot

start game =shoot the start button

thats really all you need to know, more songs comming soon!
